attributes.action: Up to 10 years or longer for carrying some sort of weapons.
attributes.background: Already 9 days in to the New Years and there has been a number of stabbings happening around London. police need to be on the search permanently for weapons ie like knifes if find carrying a weapon they should be jailed up to 10 years. London needs to take action now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're understand that you're concerned about knife crime, but we're not sure whether you'd like changes to stop and search rules or changes to sentences for carrying weapons.  

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
